title: Generate Acceptance Test Foam Cards on Button Click
description: When clicking "Create Acceptance Test" button, 1-3 acceptance test cards are generated in the modal as a list of foam cards with Given-When-Then text inputs
iWant: to click "Create Acceptance Test" and see 1-3 acceptance test foam cards generated
soThat: I can quickly create structured acceptance tests with separate Given-When-Then fields

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am viewing a user story in the details panel
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click the "Create Acceptance Test" button
acceptanceCriteria.then: a modal opens with 1-3 acceptance test foam cards displayed as a list

acceptanceCriteria.given: the modal shows acceptance test foam cards
acceptanceCriteria.then: each card has separate text input fields for Given, When, and Then

acceptanceCriteria.given: foam cards are displayed with input fields
acceptanceCriteria.when: I type in any Given-When-Then field
acceptanceCriteria.then: the text is captured and editable in that specific field
